theme: I hacked my workplace TV and made $300 this month (they still don't know)

avatar_style.persona: Rebellious, street-smart character who discovered underground money-making method
avatar_style.wardrobe: Casual, relatable clothing that signals 'regular person who cracked the code'
avatar_style.setting: Gritty, authentic workplace setting - dim lighting, real environment not staged

script.speaker: host
script.line: Okay, I just made *another* $60 last week from this dusty breakroom TV, and my boss still has NO IDEA.
script.broll_cue: dramatic reveal of cash, TV glowing in background, excited/shocked expression

script.speaker: host
script.line: Rent was due, ramen was life. I was scrolling TikTok, desperate for a side hustle that wasn't another DoorDash shift.
script.broll_cue: authentic struggle story, dimly lit room, tired expression, close up on phone scrolling

script.speaker: host
script.line: Then I saw it. That dead TV in the lobby, just playing corporate fluff. I thought, 'What if I could put *my own* stuff on it? What if I could make it pay *me*?'
script.broll_cue: showing the 'dead' TV, then a secretive phone interaction, cautious glances around

script.speaker: host
script.line: It’s this underground app. You scan a QR code, pick a template, and boom – suddenly that dead screen is earning you passive income. I’m talking local promos, events, stuff that actually helps the community and makes *you* money.
script.broll_cue: demonstrating Trillboards app, QR code scan on TV, content appearing, quick cuts

script.speaker: host
script.line: This month alone? $247. Last month, it was $180. My boss thinks I'm just watching Netflix in the breakroom. They have no idea this screen is literally *paying my bills*.
script.broll_cue: counting money secretly, then showing Trillboards earnings dashboard on phone, a satisfied, sly smile

script.speaker: host
script.line: Now, listen. This isn't for everyone. You need access to a public screen, like at your job or a local spot you know. But if you do… what are you waiting for? Stop letting those dead screens collect dust.
script.broll_cue: call to action, direct address to camera, subtle wink, then looking back at the TV

caption_overlay.text: Your boss won't tell you this

trillboards_touchpoints.action: QR code scan on workplace TV
trillboards_touchpoints.why_it_helps: Takes 30 seconds to set up passive income
Proof of concept with real numbers

metrics_hypothesis.shareability_notes: Controversial angle + specific money claims + FOMO

alt_hooks: I made $XXX this month and my boss is clueless
This side hustle only works if you have TV access
Your workplace is sitting on money and doesn't know it

rights_and_clearance_notes: Edgy but legal content - focus on legitimate unused screen monetization

scene_breakdown.prompt_text: Dramatic close-up of a person in dim workplace lighting, counting cash secretly with a shocked/excited expression, TV screen glowing in background. Transition to a tired, slightly desperate expression, phone in hand scrolling.
scene_breakdown.continuity_notes: Establish the underground/secret money-making vibe and the personal struggle.
scene_breakdown.camera_instruction: Close-up handheld style, slight shake for authenticity, then over-the-shoulder of phone.
scene_breakdown.lighting_notes: Dim, dramatic lighting with TV glow and phone screen glow.

scene_breakdown.prompt_text: Person looks around cautiously then pulls out phone, opens the Trillboards app with sneaky movements. Focus on their determined yet sly expression as they eye a dormant workplace TV.
scene_breakdown.continuity_notes: Maintain secretive atmosphere and character, transition from struggle to discovery.
scene_breakdown.camera_instruction: Over shoulder shot of phone screen, cut to person's face, then to the TV.
scene_breakdown.lighting_notes: Same dim lighting, phone screen glow on face.

scene_breakdown.prompt_text: TV screen transforms showing a large QR code. Person quickly scans it with their phone while looking around to make sure nobody sees. Fast-paced cuts between phone scanning and TV display.
scene_breakdown.continuity_notes: Build tension of secret operation and the simplicity of the 'hack'.
scene_breakdown.camera_instruction: Quick cuts between phone and TV screen, close-up on QR scan, then person's vigilant face.

scene_breakdown.prompt_text: Person sets up rotating ads/promos on the Trillboards app. Content (local promos, events) starts displaying on the TV screen. They step back with a satisfied, almost smug smile, observing the monetized screen.
scene_breakdown.continuity_notes: Show the method working and the immediate impact.
scene_breakdown.camera_instruction: Wide shot showing full TV and person, then close-up on the TV content, and back to person's face.
scene_breakdown.lighting_notes: Brighter as TV content illuminates space.

scene_breakdown.prompt_text: Person checks their earnings on the Trillboards phone app, showing growing numbers ($247, $180). They grin, then pockets money with a knowing wink to the camera. End with a subtle, triumphant smirk.
scene_breakdown.continuity_notes: Reveal the payoff and reinforce the secret success.
scene_breakdown.camera_instruction: Close-up on phone screen displaying earnings, then face for wink, final shot of them walking away casually.
scene_breakdown.lighting_notes: Phone screen brightness on face for reveal, then fading slightly for ending.
